name: Chess Master (TheRulerMeasure)
description:
Chess Master

Play a chess game with the opponent.

Game description

Use the mouse to select rock/paper/scissors to take turn.

On selected a piece, hold the left mouse button in the middle of the screen and drag the mouse to adjust the force and the push angle.

On collision of a piece, the piece will take damage, but the pushed piece will take less damage.

The King has the most health, the Queen has a lesser health, the Rook, Horse and Bishop has the same health and less than the Queen's health and the Pawn has lowest health.

The Game will end if one of the King is eliminated.

Controls

Mouse

Artwork by Me

Wowie Jam 4.0 logo by Jonas Tyroller.

This game is a submission for 

Wowie Jam 4.0
